reviews.review: The game is good but its only fun if you dont run into hackers

Best FPS game with Lots of Hackers.

Game without hitboxes. Valve needs to fix hitboxes when you tapping straight on the head the bullets are flying everywhere. This game is 50% skill and 50% luck. Pretty much same as 1.6 but only when you are spraying gun doesnt go everywhere like in 1.6. Source is way better. Still 0 hitboxes
Great competitive tactical FPS. Best played with friends with basic FPS knowledge. You can also play it singleplayer against bots.
Не возможно переподключиться в соревновательную игру!!!!!
作为一个中国人，恕我直言，这游戏真心没救了，除了外挂就是外挂，每局匹配都有外挂，挂车没事还交流交流心得我真的也是无语了，作为一个CS十余年的老玩家我觉得情怀这个东西真的是没有了，反外挂形同虚设，也恳请官方能不能想想办法，拯救一下我们这些无奈的人们。
its fun and enjoyable if you dont suck, so stop sucking

Good game, good hitboxes, good REALcoils XDDDDDDD

A good game, F2P but full of cheater without Prime. 
If you want to play it properly I strongly advise you to buy Prime. 
I have 1235 hours of playtime at this day and I still play it like it's the first time, there's a lot to learn, it's hard to master. But what a pleasure when you see your progression and your rank improve !
I strongly advise you to buy Prime if you want to play this game without cheaters !
Sick and addictive, playing it for over 10 years
Топ игруха, но скатывается из за читеров...
Sempre joguei esse game no CS 1.6 e o GO esta maravilhoso! Nostalgia do ca*****. Otimo game!
